text: {| class="infobox" cellpadding="2" style="float:right; float:right; width:26em;" |+ style="font-size: 85%;" | |- ! colspan="3" style="background:#efefef;"| Race details |- |colspan="3" style="text- align:center;" | |- |colspan="3" style="text-align:center;" | 250px |- | style="width: 20%;" | Date | 28–29 January 2017 |- | Official name |colspan=2| Hampton Downs TRS round |- | Location |colspan=2| Hampton Downs Motorsport Park, North Waikato |- | Course |colspan=2| Permanent road course |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center; background:#9cf;"| Overall results |- ! colspan="3" style="background:#efefef;"| Podium |- | First || Pedro Piquet || M2 Competition |- | Second || Thomas Randle || Victory Motor Racing |- | Third || Enaam Ahmed || Giles Motorsport |} The 2017 Hampton Downs TRS round was the third round of the 2017 Toyota Racing Series. The event was held at Hampton Downs Motorsport Park, in North Waikato, New Zealand from 28 to 29 January 2017. == Background == Heading into the weekend, Richard Verschoor leads the championship by an extensive margin. Strong, consistent performances from the young Dutchman meant he was the man to beat. Other strong performances in the field included the likes of Thomas Randle, who was a constant front runner in the first two rounds of the championship. == Report == === Practice === Thomas Randle demonstrated his pace early on by taking out four out of the five practice sessions and broke the track record in the process. Pedro Piquet took out the second practice session, narrowly beating out Randle. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%" |- ! rowspan="2"| Session ! rowspan="2"| Day ! colspan="4"| Fastest lap |- ! No. ! Driver ! Team ! Time |- | Practice 1 | rowspan="2" | Thursday | style="text-align:center;"| 49 | Thomas Randle | Victory Motor Racing | 1:00.975 |- | Practice 2 | style="text-align:center;"| 5 | Pedro Piquet | M2 Competition | 1:00.561 |- | Practice 3 | rowspan="3" | Friday | style="text-align:center;"| 49 | Thomas Randle | Victory Motor Racing | 1:00.361 |- | Practice 4 | style="text- align:center;"| 49 | Thomas Randle | Victory Motor Racing | 1:00.393 |- | Practice 5 | style="text-align:center;"| 49 | Thomas Randle | Victory Motor Racing | 1:00.109 |} === Race 1 === ==== Qualifying ==== Randle dominated qualifying by taking pole position by nearly two-tenths of a second over Jehan Daruvala. They were followed by Armstrong, Leitch and Piquet. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%" |- ! Pos ! No ! Driver ! Team ! Lap !
